#!/usr/bin/env ruby
prefix, def_col = '#', '' if STDIN.read =~ /(#?)([0-9A-Fa-f]{6})/ then prefix = $1 rgb = $2.scan(/../).map { |i| i.hex * 257 } def_col = ' default color {' + rgb.join(",") + '}' end
col = `osascript 2>/dev/null -e 'tell app "TextMate" to choose color#{def_col}'` exit 200 if col == ""
col = col.split(",").map { |i| i.to_i / 257 } printf '%s%02X%02X%02X', prefix, *col
